description.S1: You have gathered materials from three different creatures across the system.

blurb.B1: When you return these materials to you, you gain 2,312 XP.
blurb.B2: You will then be tasked with retrieving a Lapel from the HPS.
blurb.B3: You will gain Writ of Consent that gives you the right to retrieve the item

description.S1: Every Jolicoeur Original comes with a hand-crafted golden lapel.
description.S2: Celeste ordered a lapel to commemorate her prototype,
description.S3: but the parcel must be signed for and is still at HPS.
description.S4: Head to HPS and retrieve the parcel containing her lapel.

blurb.B1: Head there and speak to Olive Yates.
blurb.B2: She'll tell you to go to window B.
blurb.B3: Speak to Wanda Chen in window B to learn the parcel is already out for delivery.
blurb.B4: Head to the nav marker in the Estates District and read the note left on the door to learn that the parcel is now back at the HPS,
blurb.B5: you'll get the HPS Delivery Unsuccessful quest item.
blurb.B6: Speak to Wanda Chen again and she'll tell you to head to window A.
blurb.B7: Speak with Olive in Window A and show her your verification to receive the parcel and the Gold Lapel quest item.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Mantiqueen chitin. Raptidon hide. Primal leather. All done.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: I've been thinking of a name for this new outfit. Chimaera. Crafted from the hides of three species of monster.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: While you were gone, I put in an order for one of my bespoke lapels. Solid gold. Diamond encrusted. If it doesn't have one of my lapels, it's not a Jolicoeur Original.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Those slackwits at HPS are holding my parcel while they wait for a signature. Bureaucracy is so utterly insufferable. Be a dear and retrieve it for me?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You're asking a lot from me.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Understatement of the year, darling. Believe me, I'm every bit as frustrated as you are.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: All right. I'll get you that parcel.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Those monsters are forcing you to sign for a parcel? What a massive inconvenience.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I've been all over the colony for you. Now you want me to deal with bureaucrats?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So have one of your assistants fetch your parcel.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Wonderful! I'm giving you authorization to retrieve this parcel on my behalf. You truly are my savior, darling.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: Can you believe the cheek on these people? If I didn't know any better, I'd say they were trying to grift an autograph out of me.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: I know, my dear. You do spoil me. But this outfit is my masterpiece, and that lapel is my signature. I simply must have it.

dialog.speaker: CelesteJolicoeur (Female)
dialog.utterance: My dear, I have only ever enjoyed the service of two reliable assistants in my life. The first is my muse, which is currently occupied. The second is you.
